title: UK firm to release GEO-compatible smartphone early next year
summary: British handset maker Bullitt said Nov. 29 it will release a smartphone early next year capable of sending and receiving texts via satellites in geostationary orbit.

title: Pentagon report: China’s space strategy shaped by technological change
summary: The Pentagon in its 2022 report on China's military capabilities says the PLA continues to develop weapons for use against satellites in orbit

title: NASA to Cancel GeoCarb Mission, Expands Greenhouse Gas Portfolio
summary: NASA announced Monday it intends to cancel development of its GeoCarb mission, and instead implement a plan for pursuing alternate options to measure and observe greenhouse gases.

title: Amazon used AWS on a satellite in orbit to speed up data analysis in ‘first-of-its kind’ experiment
summary: Amazon’s cloud computing division successfully ran a software suite on a satellite in orbit, in a “first-of-its-kind” experiment, the company announced Tuesday.

title: South Korean leader eyes “landing on moon in 2032, Mars in 2045”
summary: South Korean President Yoon Suk-yeol said Nov. 28 that the country will land a robotic spacecraft on the moon in 2032 and on Mars in 2045.
